import React from 'react' import '../styles/Info.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faTruckFast, faDolly, faFaceSmileBeam, faDollarSign } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' const Info = () => { return (

We provide the best customer experience

We ensure our customers have the best shopping experience

Original Products

Your peace of mind is our priority. Enjoy genuine products or your money back

Satisfaction Guarentee

Exchange or return the product you've purchased if it doesn't fit you

New Arrivals Everyday

We update our collections almost everyday

Fast & Free Shipping

We offer fast and free shipping for all of our customers

) } /*

Shop with Confidence

Experience peace of mind with our 100% money-back guarantee on defective or disliked products. */ export default Info
